text: Anama higeno'a Asiria kini ne' Tiglat-Pilesa'a Ahasi'ma hiankea antahinemino, sondia vahe'a zamavarege'za e'za Aramu vahe rankuma Damaskasi ha' eme hu'za ana kumara eri zamagrarega atre'naze. Anama huteno anante Asiria kini ne' Tiglat-Pilesa'a Siria kini ne' Resinina ahe nefrino, ana maka Damaskasima nemaniza vahera zamavareno Kiri rankumate ome kina huzmante'ne.
